input.sentences: we tried to help set up the garden today .
we needed to add more things even though it was already growing things .

output.sentences: The man had to wear a screen over his face.
He had worn a screen over his face all his life.
Everything he looked at had the screen obstructing his view.
He loved to walk outside and look at the trees.
